Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: ドバル
Entry.EnglishText: Doval

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: ハック
Entry.EnglishText: Hack

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタ・酋長の家
Entry.EnglishText: Pipista - Chief's House

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタ・酋長の家
Entry.EnglishText: Pipista - Chief's House

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><item:12C> <item:12B>
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><item:12C> <item:12B>

Entry.JapaneseText: 捧げ物はこれです。 後は、<Mao>……頼む。
Entry.EnglishText: This is the offering. <Mao>, if you would.

Entry.JapaneseText: オッケー！ まかせといて！ ちちんぷいぷい！
Entry.EnglishText: Okay! Leave it to me! Firecazam!!

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたち!! なんという事を!!
Entry.EnglishText: What do you people think you're doing?!

Entry.JapaneseText: せ、<Yellow>聖なる鳥<White>……!! おお……これが我らの…… <Yellow>聖なる鳥<White>なのか…… 素晴らしい……
Entry.EnglishText: Th-the <Yellow>Sacred Bird<White>! Ooh... So this is our <Yellow>Sacred Bird<White>... It's magnificent!

Entry.JapaneseText: ドバル酋長、約束どおり、 ハックを解放していただけますか？
Entry.EnglishText: Chief Doval, will you release Hack from custody as you promised?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ううむ……約束は 守らねばなるまい…… よかろう……解放しよう。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Hmm, Well, a promise is a promise. Very well, I'll have him released.

Entry.JapaneseText: できましたら、ハックに<Cyan>聖壇<White>を もっと詳しく調べさせてやって いただけませんか？
Entry.EnglishText: If at all possible, would you allow Hack to conduct further research of the <Cyan>sacred altar<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……それは……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, that's a bit...

Entry.JapaneseText: ハックはヒューマですが、 知識も深く、礼儀をわきまえた若者です。 ここに忍び込んだのも、真の<Cyan>聖壇<White>の姿を 知りたかったからに他なりません。
Entry.EnglishText: Hack may be a Huma, but he is a respectable young man who possesses vast knowledge. The only reason he snuck in here was because he wanted to truly understand the <Cyan>sacred altar<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ハックの<Cyan>聖壇<White>への敬意と理解なくして、 我々が<Yellow>聖なる鳥<White>をよみがえらせる事など できなかったはずです……
Entry.EnglishText: Were it not for Hack's respect and understanding of the <Cyan>altar<White>, we would not have been able to revive the <Yellow>Sacred Bird<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わかった…… <Yellow>聖なる鳥<White>とあんたの顔に 免じて調査を許そう。 あんたたちからそう伝えてくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I understand. I will allow him to investigate it further out of consideration for the <Yellow>Sacred Bird<White> and your efforts. You can tell him yourself.

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとうございます。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you very much.

Entry.JapaneseText: 捧げ物はこれです。 後は、<Mao>……頼む。
Entry.EnglishText: This is the offering. <Mao>, if you would.

Entry.JapaneseText: オッケー！ まかせといて！ ちちんぷいぷい！
Entry.EnglishText: Okay! Leave it to me! Firecazam!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……何も起こらないではないか？ ……約束を覚えているだろうな？ <Cyan>聖壇<White>を汚しおって……おまえたちも あのヒューマと一緒に処刑だ！
Entry.EnglishText: ...Nothing's happening. Have you forgotten your promise to me? Defile the <Cyan>altar<White>, and I'll have all of you and that Huma executed!

Entry.JapaneseText: わぁぁぁぁぁッ!! ま、待ってくれ酋長さんよ!! もっとちゃんと調べてくるからさ！
Entry.EnglishText: Whoa, whoa! W-wait a second, Chief Doval! We just need to do a little more investigating!

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、許さん……!! そもそも、おまえたちヒューマを この部屋に入れる事さえ汚らわしい!!
Entry.EnglishText: No, I stand by what I said! Besides, just the presence of Huma in this room has already defiled it enough!

Entry.JapaneseText: 酋長！ 待ってください！ 申し訳ありません。 もう一度だけ、機会を与えてください。
Entry.EnglishText: Chief! Please wait! We offer our sincerest apologies for this. Please, grant us just one more chance.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……これ以上いい加減な事をして <Cyan>聖壇<White>を汚すような事があれば、 今度こそは許さんぞ。 それを忘れるな。
Entry.EnglishText: ...If you do anything even half as reckless to the <Cyan>altar<White> again, you will not be given a third chance. Don't forget that.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何か、<Cyan>聖壇<White>の事はわかったか？
Entry.EnglishText: Have you learned anything about the <Cyan>altar<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: この絵は、ピピスタの近くに 広がるツルベナ荒野に描かれている 巨大な地上絵と同じものだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: This image is identical to the massive geoglyph that covers the surface of the Crvena Wasteland on the outskirts of Pipista.
Entry.Notes: Correct spelling of Crvena according to Term sheet but flagged by QA.

Entry.JapaneseText: そして、古代カレギア文字で こう書かれている…… <Cyan>「強き心に強き翼を持て」<White>と。
Entry.EnglishText: There's also an inscription in Ancient Callegean that reads "<Cyan>a strong heart yields strong wings<White>."

Entry.JapaneseText: それはどういう意味なんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: What does that mean?

Entry.JapaneseText: さあ、それはもう少し 調べてみない事には……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know. I'll just have to study it a bit more...

Entry.JapaneseText: ならば、その地上絵のところへ 行って、調べるしかないな。
Entry.EnglishText: In that case, why don't we go check out that geoglyph ourselves?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、行こう。
Entry.EnglishText: Good idea.

Entry.JapaneseText: 僕は、この場所の調査を続けるよ。 やっとドバル酋長の許しを 得た事だしね。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm going to stay here and continue my research, now that Chief Doval has finally given me permission.

Entry.JapaneseText: 助けてくれて、ありがとう。 何もお礼してなかったね。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you for helping me the other day. I forgot my manners and didn't thank you at all.

Entry.JapaneseText: これ、あげるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Here, take this.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか不思議ないわれのある 杖らしいんだ。大切に使ってよ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's said to have a mysterious use. Take good care of it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当、君たちには、 いつもいつも 助けられっぱなしだよね。
Entry.EnglishText: Honestly, you guys are always saving my butt every time we meet.

Entry.JapaneseText: いつか恩返しをするよ。 僕にできる事があるかどうか わからないけど。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know if there's anything I can do right now, but someday I will return the favor.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『聖壇』 両側に鳥の柱を配し、 火皿に置いた香に火を灯し、 <Yellow>聖なる鳥<White>を祭っている。 捧げ物を置くための 四角いくぼみがある。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Sacred Altar - The altar is flanked on both sides by bird-shaped pillars and lit by incense placed in a censer. It is here the <Yellow>Sacred Bird<White> is worshipped. There is a rectangular cavity to place offerings.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『聖壇』 <Yellow>聖なる鳥<White>の絵が 壁に浮かび上がっている。 何やら文字らしきものも記されている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Sacred Altar - A painting of the <Yellow>Sacred Bird<White> is displayed on the wall. There also appears to be some sort of writing on it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『聖壇』 <Yellow>聖なる鳥<White>の絵が描かれている。 <Yellow>ツルベナ荒野の地上絵<White>と同じもの。 古代カレギア文字で <Cyan>「強き心に強き翼を持て」<White>と 記されている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>-Sacred Altar - The painting of the <Yellow>Sacred Bird<White> depicts the same image as the one in the Crvena Wasteland. The inscription written in Ancient Callegean reads "<Cyan>a strong heart yields strong wings<White>."
